```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(broom)

mpg

lm(hwy ~ displ, data = mpg)

lm_mod <- function(df){
  lm(hwy ~ displ, data = df)
}

lm_mod(mpg)


mpg_manf <- mpg %>% 
  group_by(manufacturer) %>% 
  nest()

mpg_manf$data[[3]]

mpg_manf <- mpg_manf %>% 
  mutate(model = map(data, lm_mod))

mpg_manf$model[[1]]

mpg_manf <- mpg_manf %>% 
  mutate(fit = map(model, tidy))

mpg_manf$fit[[1]]

mpg_manf <- mpg_manf %>% 
  unnest(fit)
```

```{r}
mpg_manf %>%
  filter(term == "(Intercept)") %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = fct_reorder(manufacturer, estimate), y = estimate)) +
  geom_point() +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
mpg %>%
  group_by(manufacturer) %>% 
  nest() %>% 
  mutate(model = map(data, ~lm(hwy ~ displ, data = .x)),
         fit = map(model, tidy)) %>% 
  unnest(fit)
```
